pokemon

Class Pokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • pokemon.Pokemon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bulbasaur, Caterpie, Charmander, Dragonite, Eevee, Electrode, Flareon, Gyarados, Ivysaur, Luxio, Pikachu, Psyduck, Squirtle, Vaporeon, Zapdos

    public abstract class Pokemon
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class of all pokemon. Provides name, type, and battle stats for a pokemon.
    Author:
    Abdullah Asaad

        Parameters:
        name - name of pokemon.
        type - elemental type of pokemon.
        occurRate - rarity of pokemon (common, uncommon, or rare).
